(I'm sorry TheCode, but if that wrestling bot comes near one of my 
chracters, I'm not going to respond. I have dygnity and sense in my 
characters. I won't have them interacting with a bot that is an idiot and 
asks childish.)

>The Rock:
>
>::A stasis pod, trapped in the Himilayas, is shaken loose by an avalanche.
>The stasis pod slides through the white snow.  A goat, watches it curiously
>as it stops, from a far off distance, running off, though another goat
>appraoches it, scraping its horns against the metal.  The scanner/orb 
>device
>pops up, acquiring a beast mode.  The stasis pod opens, a 7 ft high robot
>stepping out::
>"What the...this...isn't...the Axalon...or Cybertron...I must've landed on 
>a
>slagging ice planet!  Just my luck, happens again!"
